articles.title: Here's what to expect from gas prices as summer driving season begins - Washington Examiner
articles.description: Millions of drivers in the United States are slated to hit the road this Memorial Day weekend, but the expected spike in demand isn't expected to send gasoline prices anywhere near last year's record highs.
